Text: You fucking morons who just downloading and not seeding! You are torrent-killers! Dont you understand that you are killing all sharing by doing that? DONT DOWNLOAD IF YOU DONT SEEDING ALL THAT YOU HAVE DOWNLOADED FOR FREE YOU FUCKING MORONS!
